name: VISEO-Group-DeploySendGridMailTemplates
description: Deploys mail templates to SendGrid using its API.
author: Illia Chuikov. VISEO Group

inputs.name: sendGridUserName
inputs.label: Send Grid User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name of your SendGrid account.

inputs.name: sendGridPassword
inputs.label: Send Grid Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password of your SendGrid account.

inputs.name: templatesDirectoryPath
inputs.label: Path to folder with templates
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to directory with templates.

inputs.name: groupId
inputs.label: The Id of variable group
inputs.helpMarkDown: The id of variable group, where template ids will be stored (can be found in url).

messages.directoryDoesNotExistErrorMessage: The specified directory with tepmlates doesn't exist.
messages.specifiedPathIsNotAFolderErrorMessage: The specified path is not a folder.
messages.noHtmlFilesErrorMessage: There are not any html files in specified folder.
messages.apiKeyDeleteErrorMessage: The delete of SendGrid API key was unsuccessful.
messages.apiKeyCreateErrorMessage: The creation of SendGrid API key was unsuccessful.
messages.variableGroupUpdateErrorMessage: Update of Variable Group was unsuccessful.
messages.insufficientPermissionsErrorMessage: Insufficient permissions to work with variable groups.
messages.templateCreateErrorMessage: The creation of template was unsuccessful.
messages.templateVersionCreateErrorMessage: The creation of template version was unsuccessful.
messages.variableGroupDescription: Contains ids of SendGrid mail templates.
